trans-unit.resname: You might create a sequence of challenges where players won't be able to access a new game or challenge until they obtain a key from previous activity. For this purpose, you might set up an access code as well as a message that will be displayed to players when they reach a fixed percentage of correct answers, which they can use as a password for a new challenge or a following activity.
trans-unit.source: You might create a sequence of challenges where players won't be able to access a new game or challenge until they obtain a key from previous activity. For this purpose, you might set up an access code as well as a message that will be displayed to players when they reach a fixed percentage of correct answers, which they can use as a password for a new challenge or a following activity.
trans-unit.target: Podeu crear un itinerari de desafiaments on els jugadors no podran accedir a un nou joc o desafiament fins que obtinguen una clau en una activitat prèvia. Per a aquest propòsit, pot establir un codi d'accés, així com un missatge que es pot mostrar als jugadors quan obtenen un percentatge fix de colps, i es pot utilitzar com a contrasenya per a un nou desafiament o una activitat següent.

Per seleccionar les paraules que vols amagar, doble clic a la paraula per seleccionar-la i fes clic al botó Amaga/Mostra paraula a sota. Pots definir més d'una resposta possible si estan envoltades pel signe de tub (|). Per exemple: |gos|gats|ocell|

trans-unit.resname: If unchecked, a small number of spelling and capitalization errors will be accepted. If checked, no spelling or capitalization errors will be accepted. Example: If the correct answer is Elephant and it says elephant or Eliphant, both will be considered as "close enough" by the algorithm, as there is only one spelling error, even if "Check capitalization" is checked. If the case check is disabled in this example, the lowercase letter e is not considered an error and eliphant will also be accepted. If "Strict qualification" and "Check capitalization" are enabled, the only correct answer is "Elephant". If only "Strict qualification" is enabled and "Check capitalization" is not, "elephant" will also be accepted.
trans-unit.source: If unchecked, a small number of spelling and capitalization errors will be accepted. If checked, no spelling or capitalization errors will be accepted. Example: If the correct answer is Elephant and it says elephant or Eliphant, both will be considered as "close enough" by the algorithm, as there is only one spelling error, even if "Check capitalization" is checked. If the case check is disabled in this example, the lowercase letter e is not considered an error and eliphant will also be accepted. If "Strict qualification" and "Check capitalization" are enabled, the only correct answer is "Elephant". If only "Strict qualification" is enabled and "Check capitalization" is not, "elephant" will also be accepted.
trans-unit.target: Si no està marcat, s'acceptarà un petit nombre d'errors d'ortografia i de majúscules. Si està marcat, no s'acceptaran errors d'ortografia ni de majúscules. Exemple: Si la resposta correcta és Elefant i diu elefant o Eliphant, ambdues seran considerades com "suficientment properes" per l'algoritme, ja que només hi ha un error d'ortografia, encara que "Comprova majúscules" estiga marcat. Si en aquest exemple es desactiva la verificació de majúscules, la lletra minúscula e no es considerarà un error i també s'acceptarà el terme eliphant. Si s'activen "Qualificació estricta" i "Comprova majúscules", l'única resposta correcta serà "Elefant". Si només s'activa "Qualificació estricta" i "Comprova majúscules" no, també s'acceptarà "elefant".

trans-unit.resname: If this option is checked, answers submitted with case differences will be marked as incorrect.
trans-unit.source: If this option is checked, answers submitted with case differences will be marked as incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Si aquesta opció està marcada, les respostes enviades amb diferències de majúscules i minúscules seran marcades com incorrectes.

trans-unit.resname: eXeLearning is a free software tool under the GNU Affero GPL that can be used to create educational interactive web contents. eXeLearning can generate interactive contents in different formats and it allows you to create easily navigable web pages. All the educational materials generated with eXeLearning can be exported in different digital formats, to be used independently or to integrate them into a LMS (Learning Management System) like Moodle.
trans-unit.source: eXeLearning is a free software tool under the GNU Affero GPL that can be used to create educational interactive web contents. eXeLearning can generate interactive contents in different formats and it allows you to create easily navigable web pages. All the educational materials generated with eXeLearning can be exported in different digital formats, to be used independently or to integrate them into a LMS (Learning Management System) like Moodle.
trans-unit.target: eXeLearning és una eina de programari lliure sota GNU Affero GPL que es pot utilitzar per a crear continguts web educatius interactius. eXeLearning pot generar continguts interactius en diferents formats i permet crear pàgines web fàcilment navegables. Tot el material educatiu generat amb eXeLearning es pot exportar en diferents formats digitals, per a ser utilitzat de manera independent o per a integrar-los en un LMS (Learning Management System) com Moodle.

trans-unit.resname: Type or paste the text for the fill-in-the-blank activity into the field. Select the words and use the button below to hide them. You can define more than one possible answer using vertical bars to surround and separate them. E.g.: |dog|cat|bird|
trans-unit.source: Type or paste the text for the fill-in-the-blank activity into the field. Select the words and use the button below to hide them. You can define more than one possible answer using vertical bars to surround and separate them. E.g.: |dog|cat|bird|
trans-unit.target: ~Escriviu o enganxeu el text de l'activitat d'omplir espais en blanc al camp. Seleccioneu les paraules i utilitzeu el botó de sota per ocultar-les. Podeu definir més d'una resposta possible utilitzant barres verticals per envoltar-les i separar-les. P. ex.: |gos|gat|ocell|
